DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study use randomize , double blind , comparison two iodinated contrast agent use percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) . All patient enrol must estimate glomerular filtration [ eGFR ] < 30 mL/min/1.73 m2 . Statistical summary present analyse various laboratory test two group .
DOC.brief_title: Kidney Damage In Patients With Severe Fall In eGFR
DOC.criteria: Provides write Informed Consent Is least 18 year age ; Is schedule likely undergo percutaneous coronary intervention ; Has document estimate glomerular filtration rate [ eGFR ] < 30 mL/min/1.73 m2 calculate MDRD formula within 72 hour prior enrolment . Is pregnant lactate female Has history severe congestive heart failure Has history hyperthyroidism Has unstable renal function Has history hypersensitivity iodinate contrast agent
